section.p: On the other side of the bridge waits an armoured knight mounted on a huge black lion. As he sees you he lowers his visor and readies his lance.
‘Prepare to joust,’ grates his voice from inside the metal helm.
‘A misfortune,’ he admits. ‘You should have come better prepared.’

He comes charging along the bridge.
If you have a rope, .
If not, .
